column2: Vegas is a jQuery/Zepto plugin to add beautiful backgrounds and Slideshows to DOM elements.

column5:
Merge pull request #182 from davide93/patch-1

Update README.md http:// to https:// link.
Update README.md http:// to https:// link.

Merge pull request #181 from zackschuster/patch-1

fix sass compiler error

fix sass compiler error

since semicolons are apparently banned in indented mode (or so the sass compiler told me today when I tried to pick up 2.4.3 :P)
Autoplay Enabled - Jump to a specific slide fix #150 (hexplor)

fix a glitch on blur transition effect

Merge pull request #150 from hexplor/patch-1

Autplay Enabled - Jump to a specific slide fix

fix a glitch on blur transition effect

As described issue #174

Autplay Enabled - Jump to a specific slide fix

Before fix:
1. Enable Autoplay
2. Disable Loop
3. Go to last slide and wait for "end" state.
4. Execute $elmt.vegas('jump', any_slide_goes_here);
Result: Vegas will jump to specific slide but ***will not play*** next slide. It appears like autoplay is killed (which is sort of right due to _end function).

After fix:
1. Enable Autoplay
2. Disable Loop
3. Go to last slide and wait for "end" state.
4. Execute $elmt.vegas('jump', any_slide_goes_here);
Result: Vegas will jump to specific slide and after that it will autoplay next slide as it supposed to do.
Add will-change CSS property to slides
Add slidesToKeep option to set the number of slides kept behind the main slide

Auto-detection causes that the css file must be on the same server. Remote hosting was impossible.

Merge pull request #10 from mrflix/master

Massive overlay file-size reduction

minimized the total overlay images' file-size by 82%

total file-size before: 337 kb
total file-size now: 20 kb
How? These 7 files had additional Adobe Fireworks information stored
inside of them, bloating each of them to about 50 kb.

Better image preloading

- using DOM to preload the images - replaced tabs with spaces
